front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for Enterprise YANG Modules

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for Uniform Resource Namespace (URN) resources to uniquely identify enterprise YANG modules. This document defines a single top level "rdns" Namespace identifier (NID), with which organizations and enterprises can define Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespaces to uniquely identify enterprise YANG modules.
